item.title: Can iPhone 3G S Be The Universal Gadget?
item.description:
People love electronics but hate carrying a lot of them around. A single, universal gadget would be ideal â€“ one that combines the functions of a cell phone, TV, camera, computer, and more. Such a device would need to be a phone, TV, DVR, high-quality camera, camcorder, audio recorder, navigation system, gaming console, computer, messaging system, productivity tool, radio, eBook reader, music player, stock trading platform, watch, alarm clock, weather tracker, and shopping service...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/can-iphone-3g-s-be-the-universal-gadget/
